infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: App requires background location for geofences.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: App requires location background location for geofencing trailheads.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: App requires location background location for geofencing when running.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: App requires location for geofencing even when the App is backgrounded.
